selection_reasoning: The analysis of Generation 11 revealed that high-precision local optimization is secondary to global exploration for this problem. The best trials (8_0, 10_2) succeed because they use the full 60-second window to perform continuous basin-hopping. I am selecting the top historical performers to ensure the next generation builds on the successful 'exploration-first' strategy.
